*June 10th, revision 71:*<BR>
I decided to do a larger test: All lowercase letters and numbers up to a password size of 5:<BR>

stefano@stefano-pc:~/Desktop/cudamd5$ time ./cudamd5 -c0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz -t95ebc3c7b3b9f1d2c40fec14415d3cb8 --min=1 --max=5 <BR>
Found key: zzzzzï¿½ <BR>
62193780 keys searched.<BR>

real	4m3.933s<BR>
user	0m57.560s<BR>

It took 30 seconds to initialise the 62M string vector, 2mins to do the hashing/searching/cracking and then it seemed to do nothing for 1min33s ... strange. I don't yet know why.

However, assuming 2mins to search ~62M hashes:
 *Throughput =~ 518 281.5 hashes/second.*
